definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: "The goal Macheda scored was excellent, " the boss said at his post-match press conference.
sentences.chinese: “马切达进的那个球很帅，”老板在赛后记者会上说。

sentences.english: However, Lin Zengxian was moved to tears in a recent press conference.
sentences.chinese: 不过林增祥日前在记者会上激动落泪。

sentences.english: The press conference now begins. I am ready to take your questions.
sentences.chinese: 记者会开始，现在我愿意回答各位的提问。

sentences.english: On the second question, I have answered it at Tuesday's press conference.
sentences.chinese: 第二个问题，星期二记者会上我已经回答了有关问题。

sentences.english: If you want, I can ask for information for you after the press conference.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要的话，我也可以在记者会后帮你进行了解。

sentences.english: Welcome to the press conference. I have several announcements to start with.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎出席外交部例行记者会，首先我发布几条消息。

sentences.english: At the final press conference Friday, Mr. Van Rumpoy hailed the results.
sentences.chinese: 范龙佩在星期五的记者会上对峰会的结果表示满意。

sentences.english: Branch chief Yukio Ueno said at a press conference, "do not understand the relevant facts."
sentences.chinese: 官房长官枝野幸男在记者会上称“不了解相关事实”。

sentences.english: Everything cleared up in a half-hour media conference.
sentences.chinese: 在半个小时的记者会后，一切都很明了。

sentences.english: On the afternoon of February 9th, Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Kong Quan held the regular press conference.
sentences.chinese: 2月9日下午，外交部发言人孔泉主持例行记者会。

sentences.english: Qin Gang concluded the press conference by sharing a water-saving tip with the audience.
sentences.chinese: 记者会结束时，秦刚说，我给大家介绍一个节水提示。

sentences.english: Glance of Tse Wing Ning, Member of the Anti-Discrimination Alliance.
sentences.chinese: 反歧视大联盟成员谢永龄在记者会上的一个眼神。

sentences.english: Melkert spoke during a news conference in Baghdad Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 梅尔克特星期叁在巴格达的一次记者会上说的这番话。

sentences.english: Journalists can mislead the public about the answers of evidence-based medicine, which is bad.
sentences.chinese: 记者会误导市民对于循证医药的看法，果然卑鄙。

sentences.english: If there are no more questions, we conclude here today.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有其他问题了，记者会到此结束。

definition: according to a report/It is reported that...
to make a speech/to make some remarks
